channel.title: Emotes bugging?
channel.description: Hello im making my new project with Richscape source v2 and i was looking around pressed animations tab(it got old tab ike allstar) Pressed animation it does non stop! Example. i press dance emote and its non stopping dance untill i walk somewhere or do sumthing other.. Anyone can help me? Tried many things not woking. Please some one fast!
